UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Accounting, Economics, Management, Mathematics, Geography and Statistics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects. For NBC, the other two (2) relevant subjects could be from any of the following; Accounting, Principles of Accounts, Commerce, Office Practice and Economics.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics, plus any one (1) of Government and Geography.

i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Biology, Botany/Zoology.

(ii) NCE merit accepted.

Subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes chosen from Economics, Accounts, Business Management, Government, Geography or Statistics.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics, plus any two (2) of Accounting, Business Methods, Commerce, Government, Geography, and Statistics.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics and one (1) other subject.

Direct Entry Requirements:
i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology.

Subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics

Subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

Subjects: Any three (3) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject.

)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics
